titleStmt.title: A. Johnston et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG10909

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Petitions for Pardons and Remissions, 1859-1862

body.p:
To his Excellency
B Magoffin
Governor of Kentucky

We the undersigned Citizens of Marshall would recommend and most respectfully ask that the find assessed against W. B. Walters and John Dishman at September Term 1860 of the Marshall Equity & Crimminal Court for two hundred Dollars each, be remitted, and as in duty bound we will ever pray &c
Sept 1860

A. Johnston
G. S. Jones
J H Flowers
C. H Philly
A. Williams
John Stice
R. A. Wade
Josiah Jordan
R. Stokes
Jas. H Johnston
Thomas H Bleuett
Wm King
E. C. Dycus
James McBride
Henry Molone

Marshall E & C. Ct
$200 each } Assault
W. B. Walters & Jno Dishman
Respd 12 mos
Issd Decr. 1 1860
